titleNullable: Nike,Adidas Shoes for Image Classification Dataset
subtitleNullable: Nike and Adidas Shoes Dataset to train a Deep Learning Model
descriptionNullable:
This dataset can be used to build a CNN model that can classify if a shoe is an Adidas or Nike brand.

The images were pulled from bing using bing_image_search from pypi, 400 images of each class were downloaded and then the dataset was trimmed to 300(some unrelated images were removed in the process of compiling the dataset).

[Link to Notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1QDhhhEeAWHLES0l2YPAmd7MQVKAiwhi4?usp=sharing)
title: Nike,Adidas Shoes for Image Classification Dataset
subtitle: Nike and Adidas Shoes Dataset to train a Deep Learning Model
description:
This dataset can be used to build a CNN model that can classify if a shoe is an Adidas or Nike brand.

The images were pulled from bing using bing_image_search from pypi, 400 images of each class were downloaded and then the dataset was trimmed to 300(some unrelated images were removed in the process of compiling the dataset).

[Link to Notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1QDhhhEeAWHLES0l2YPAmd7MQVKAiwhi4?usp=sharing)
